extension.description: By utilizing multiple maps and locations providers, this add-on will allow you to explore the World map, find points of interest, and see panoramic views in certain places.
透過使用多位地圖和地點服務提供者，此附加元件能讓您探索世界地圖、找到興趣點、以及觀看景某些地方的全景圖。
extension.disclaimer: Requires your own credentials to access the providers. Each provider has its own terms of service.
此等服務皆需要你自己向個別的服務供應/營運者申請憑證。每位供應者都有自己的服務條款。
